name: Maintenance of trust account
text: [§431:4F-104]  Maintenance of trust account.  The trusteed assets, or the assets of the trust account of an alien insurer, as required by section 431:4F-103, shall at all times be in an amount equal to the United States branch's reserves and other liabilities plus the minimum capital and surplus or authorized control level risk-based capital, whichever is greater, required to be maintained by a domestic insurer licensed to do the same kind of insurance. [L 2004, c 120, pt of §2]
